function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of public transportation without proper health protocols","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement health protocols such as physical distancing, barriers/partitions, and regular disinfection","Technologies":"Barriers/partitions, disinfection equipment","People":"Workers, passengers","Owner":"Transportation company, government"},{"Description":"Inadequate transportation arrangements by the company","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Provide sufficient transportation resources and arrange seats at a minimum distance of one meter","Technologies":"Arrangement of seats, transportation scheduling","People":"Workers, passengers","Owner":"Company management"}]}
